title: Great Mistakes: A Leaning Tower (Premium)
description:
This is a preview episode. Get the full episode, and many more, ad free, on our supporter's feed: https://getsleepy.com/support.


Great MIstakes: A Leaning Tower
Tonight, we have the second instalment of this mini series, all about famous mishaps that turned out for the best. This time round, we go back through the centuries to to hear about a piece of off-kilter architecture in the Italian city of Pisa. 😴 
 
Sound design: city river & ambiance. 🛶🏛
Narrator: Thomas Jones


About Get Sleepy Premium:
Help support the podcast, and get:

Access to the entire back catalog (also ad-free)

Premium sleep meditations, extra-long episodes and more!

We'll love you forever. ❤️

Get a 7 day free trial, and join the Get Sleepy community here https://getsleepy.com/support.
And thank you so, so much. 
Tom, and the team.
itunes:title: Great Mistakes: A Leaning Tower (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. A series of historical blunders come together to create one of the most famous and beloved places in the world.
